question: Where is the headquarters of Indian Council of World Affairs (ICWA)?
explanation: In New Delhi, the national conference on ‘India-Africa Partnership in a Changing Global Order--Priorities, Prospects and Challenges’ was organized by Indian Council of World Affairs (ICWA). The ICWA is devoted exclusively for the study of international relations and foreign affairs.  It is also a member of the United Nations Academic Impact, The Vice President of India is the ex-officio President of ICWA, while the Minister of External Affairs is its Vice-President. It headquarters is located in National capital.
